mapper.select: SELECT * FROM AchievementEffect WHERE achievementNum = #{achievementNum} AND statNum = #{statNum} AND statType = #{statType};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO AchievementEffect (achievementNum, statNum, statType, statValue) VALUES (#{achievementNum}, #{statNum}, #{statType}, #{statValue});
mapper.update: UPDATE AchievementEffect SET statValue = #{statValue} WHERE achievementNum = #{achievementNum} AND statNum = #{statNum} AND statType = #{statType};
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM AchievementEffect WHERE achievementNum = #{achievementNum} AND statNum = #{statNum} AND statType = #{statType};
